author: AAA3A
name: ViewPermissions
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: A cog to display permissions for roles and members, at guild level or in a specified channel!
description: A cog to display permissions for roles and members, at guild level or in a specified channel!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
